
####################################################################################################
###																								 ###
###						   	Падежи титулов правителя строчными буквами							 ###
###																								 ###
###																								 ###
###						   Титулы прописаны с уже готовыми окончаниями!							 ###
###				В большинстве из них учитывается пол, задающийся папкой government_names		 ###
###																								 ###
###		Именительный (Кто, что?) - "[LIT.GetTitleIM]" : "великий князь", "великая княгиня"  	 ###
###		Родительный (Кого, чего?) - "[LIT.GetTitleRD]" : "великого князя", "великой княгини"  	 ###
###		Дательный (Кому, чему?) - "[LIT.GetTitleDT]" : "великому князю", "великой княгине"  	 ###
###		Винительный (Кого, что?) - "[LIT.GetTitleVN]" : "великого князя", "великую княгиню" 	 ###
###		Творительный (Кем, чем?) - "[LIT.GetTitleTV]" : "великим князем", "великой княгиней"  	 ###
###		Предложный (О ком, о чём?) - "[LIT.GetTitlePR]" : "великом князе", "великой княгине"  	 ###
###																								 ###
###						  			 Локализация в: anb_title									 ###
###																								 ###
####################################################################################################

defined_text = {
	name = GetTitleIM
	#rainforest_king
	text = {
		localisation_key = KING_IM
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			has_reform = tribal_kingdom
			culture_group = yanglam
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = HARI_IM
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			has_reform = tribal_kingdom
			culture_group = yanglam

		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = GREAT_HARI_IM
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 3 
			has_reform = tribal_kingdom
			culture_group = yanglam
		}
	}

	#acromton_monarchy
	text = {
		localisation_key = DUKE_CROSSGUARD_IM
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				tag = Z40			#you're Acromton
				AND = {
					tag = A18		#you're Rubenaire with cores on Acromton (1444 start)
					276 = {
						is_core = A18
					}
					330 = {
						is_core = A18
					}
					# A18 = {
						# is_core = 276
						# is_core = 330
					# }
				}
				has_country_flag = rubenaire_the_crossguard
			}
		}
	}

		localisation_key = SKY_CAPTAIN_IM

			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }

			}
		}

		localisation_key = MARQUIS_IM

			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			is_part_of_hre = yes
			government = monarchy
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			OR = {	#You're either an actual March or a historical march of Anbennar
				is_march = yes
				has_country_flag = is_a_marquisate
			}
		}
	}

#monarchy_county	
	text = {
		localisation_key = COUNT_IM
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = is_a_county
				AND = {
					is_part_of_hre = yes
					is_elector = no
					is_emperor = no
				}
			}
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			NOT = { total_development = 50 }
		}
	}

#revolutionary_gawedi_republic	
	text = {
		localisation_key = CHAIRMAN_IM
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			is_revolutionary_republic_trigger = yes
			OR = {
				primary_culture = gawedi
				primary_culture = old_alenic
				primary_culture = moorman
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = CHAIRMAN_IM
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			is_revolutionary_republic_trigger = yes
			OR = {

			}
		}

		localisation_key = DIRECTOR_IM

			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
				primary_culture = vertesker
				primary_culture = crownsman
				culture_group = gnomish
			}
			OR = {
				has_reform = colonial_government
				has_reform = crown_colony_government
				has_reform = private_enterprise_colony_government
				has_reform = self_governing_colony_government
			}

				limit = { exists = event_target:feiten_or_was_feiten_target }

			}
		}

#gov_ravelian_papal_government начало 00_anbennar_government_names.txt
	text = {
		localisation_key = HIGH_RECTOR_RD
		trigger = {
			is_female = no

#adventurer_monarchy	
	text = {
		localisation_key = PETTY_KING_RD
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = { superregion = escann_superregion }
						capital_scope = { region = forlorn_vale_region }
					}
					government = monarchy
					has_country_flag = adventurer_derived_government
				}
				has_reform = adventurer_kingdom_reform
			}

		}

				has_reform = adventurer_kingdom_reform
			}

		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = LADY_RD
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = { superregion = escann_superregion }
						capital_scope = { region = forlorn_vale_region }
					}
					government = monarchy
					has_country_flag = adventurer_derived_government
				}
				has_reform = adventurer_kingdom_reform
			}

		}

			}
		}

			}

			government_rank = 3 
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = is_a_county
				AND = {
					is_part_of_hre = yes
					is_elector = no
					is_emperor = no
				}
			}
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			NOT = { total_development = 50 }
		}
	}

#viceroy_colonial_government	
 	text = {
		localisation_key = VICEROY_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
			culture_group = lencori
			culture_group = businori
			culture_group = divenori
			culture_group = bulwari
			}
			OR = {
				has_reform = colonial_government
				has_reform = crown_colony_government
				has_reform = private_enterprise_colony_government
				has_reform = self_governing_colony_government
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = VICERINE_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 1 
			OR = {
			culture_group = lencori
			culture_group = businori
			culture_group = divenori
			culture_group = bulwari
			}
			OR = {
				has_reform = colonial_government
				has_reform = crown_colony_government
				has_reform = private_enterprise_colony_government
				has_reform = self_governing_colony_government
			}
		}
	}
#director_colonial_government

 	text = {
		localisation_key = DIRECTOR_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
				primary_culture = vertesker
				primary_culture = crownsman
				culture_group = gnomish
			}
			OR = {
				has_reform = colonial_government
				has_reform = crown_colony_government
				has_reform = private_enterprise_colony_government
				has_reform = self_governing_colony_government
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = DIRECTORESS_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 1 
			OR = {
				primary_culture = vertesker
				primary_culture = crownsman
				culture_group = gnomish
			}
			OR = {
				has_reform = colonial_government
				has_reform = crown_colony_government
				has_reform = private_enterprise_colony_government
				has_reform = self_governing_colony_government
			}
		}
	}
	
	#eordand_theocracy
	text = {
		localisation_key = ESBAGG_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			government = theocracy
			culture_group = eordan_ruinborn_elf
			OR = {
				has_reform = monastic_order_reform
				has_reform = leading_clergy_reform
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = SGARRT_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }

#adventurer_monarchy	
	text = {
		localisation_key = PETTY_KING_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = { superregion = escann_superregion }
						capital_scope = { region = forlorn_vale_region }
					}
					government = monarchy
					has_country_flag = adventurer_derived_government
				}
				has_reform = adventurer_kingdom_reform
			}

		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = KING_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = { superregion = escann_superregion }
						capital_scope = { region = forlorn_vale_region }
					}
					government = monarchy
					has_country_flag = adventurer_derived_government
				}
				has_reform = adventurer_kingdom_reform
			}

		}
	}

#magisterium
	text = {
		localisation_key = GRAND_MAGISTER_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			has_reform = magocracy_reform
			OR = {
				has_estate_privilege = estate_mages_organization_magisterium
				tag = A85
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = GRAND_MAGISTER_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2

#anbennar_republic
	text = {
		localisation_key = LORD_MAYOR_DT
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
				culture_group = anbennarian
				culture_group = alenic
				culture_group = halfling
				culture_group = lencori			
			}
			government = republic
			NOT = {
				has_reform = colonial_government
				has_reform = crown_colony_government
				has_reform = private_enterprise_colony_government
				has_reform = self_governing_colony_government
			}
		}
	}

			}

		localisation_key = COUNT_VN
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1

					is_part_of_hre = yes
					is_elector = no
					is_emperor = no
				}
			}
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			NOT = { total_development = 50 }
		}

#adventurer_monarchy	
	text = {
		localisation_key = PETTY_KING_VN
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = { superregion = escann_superregion }
						capital_scope = { region = forlorn_vale_region }
					}
					government = monarchy
					has_country_flag = adventurer_derived_government
				}
				has_reform = adventurer_kingdom_reform
			}

		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = KING_VN
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = { superregion = escann_superregion }
						capital_scope = { region = forlorn_vale_region }
					}
					government = monarchy
					has_country_flag = adventurer_derived_government
				}
				has_reform = adventurer_kingdom_reform
			}

		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = EMPEROR_VN
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 3 
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = { superregion = escann_superregion }
						capital_scope = { region = forlorn_vale_region }
					}
					government = monarchy
					has_country_flag = adventurer_derived_government
				}
				has_reform = adventurer_kingdom_reform
			}

		}
	}

		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = { superregion = escann_superregion }
						capital_scope = { region = forlorn_vale_region }
					}
					government = monarchy
					has_country_flag = adventurer_derived_government
				}
				has_reform = adventurer_kingdom_reform
			}

		}
	}

				has_country_flag = knightly_order_adventurer
			}	
			government = theocracy
			is_elector = yes
			is_emperor = no
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = MARQUIS_TV
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			is_part_of_hre = yes
			government = monarchy
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			OR = {	#You're either an actual March or a historical march of Anbennar
				is_march = yes
				has_country_flag = is_a_marquisate
			}
		}
	}

			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			is_part_of_hre = yes
			government = monarchy
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			OR = {	#You're either an actual March or a historical march of Anbennar
				is_march = yes
				has_country_flag = is_a_marquisate
			}
		}
	}

				tag = Z40			#you're Acromton

					tag = A18		#you're Rubenaire with cores on Acromton (1444 start)

					# }

				has_country_flag = rubenaire_the_crossguard
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = EMPRESS_CROSSGUARD_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 3 
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				tag = Z40			#you're Acromton
				AND = {
					tag = A18		#you're Rubenaire with cores on Acromton (1444 start)
					276 = {
						is_core = A18
					}
					330 = {
						is_core = A18
					}
					# A18 = {
						# is_core = 276
						# is_core = 330
					# }
				}
				has_country_flag = rubenaire_the_crossguard
			}
		}
	}

		localisation_key = COUNCILOR_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			has_reform = eternal_council
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = CHANCELLOR_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			has_reform = eternal_council
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = CHANCELLOR_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 3 
			has_reform = eternal_council
		}
	}
#kai_republic

		localisation_key = LORD_PR

				has_reform = azkare_court
			}
		}

		localisation_key = LESSER_KING_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			always = no #need to decide on these first
			has_reform = yanglam_tengalam_reform
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = KING_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			always = no #need to decide on these first
			has_reform = yanglam_tengalam_reform
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = KING_OF_KINGS_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 3 
			always = no #need to decide on these first
			has_reform = yanglam_tengalam_reform
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = LESSER_QUEEN_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			always = no #need to decide on these first
			has_reform = yanglam_tengalam_reform
		}
	}
	text = {

		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			always = no #need to decide on these first

#march_anbennar_monarchy
	text = {
		localisation_key = MARQUIS_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			is_part_of_hre = yes
			government = monarchy
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			OR = {	#You're either an actual March or a historical march of Anbennar
				is_march = yes
				has_country_flag = is_a_marquisate
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = GRAND_MARQUIS_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			is_part_of_hre = yes
			government = monarchy
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			OR = {	#You're either an actual March or a historical march of Anbennar
				is_march = yes
				has_country_flag = is_a_marquisate
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = EMPEROR_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 3 
			is_part_of_hre = yes
			government = monarchy
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			OR = {	#You're either an actual March or a historical march of Anbennar
				is_march = yes
				has_country_flag = is_a_marquisate
			}
		}
	}

#monarchy_county	
	text = {
		localisation_key = COUNT_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = is_a_county
				AND = {
					is_part_of_hre = yes
					is_elector = no
					is_emperor = no
				}
			}
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			NOT = { total_development = 50 }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = KING_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = is_a_county
				AND = {
					is_part_of_hre = yes
					is_elector = no
					is_emperor = no
				}
			}
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			NOT = { total_development = 50 }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = EMPEROR_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 3 
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = is_a_county
				AND = {
					is_part_of_hre = yes
					is_elector = no
					is_emperor = no
				}
			}
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			NOT = { total_development = 50 }
		}
	}

	text = {
		localisation_key = COUNTESS_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = is_a_county
				AND = {
					is_part_of_hre = yes
					is_elector = no
					is_emperor = no
				}
			}
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			NOT = { total_development = 50 }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = QUEEN_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = is_a_county
				AND = {
					is_part_of_hre = yes

					is_emperor = no
				}
			}
			NOT = { culture_group = elven } #Elfrealms take priority
			NOT = { total_development = 50 }
		}

#revolutionary_gawedi_republic	
	text = {
		localisation_key = CHAIRMAN_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			is_revolutionary_republic_trigger = yes
			OR = {
				primary_culture = gawedi
				primary_culture = old_alenic
				primary_culture = moorman
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = CHAIRMAN_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 2 
			NOT = { government_rank = 3 }
			is_revolutionary_republic_trigger = yes
			OR = {
				primary_culture = gawedi
				primary_culture = old_alenic
				primary_culture = moorman
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = CHAIRMAN_PR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 3 
			is_revolutionary_republic_trigger = yes
			OR = {
				primary_culture = gawedi
				primary_culture = old_alenic
				primary_culture = moorman
			}
		}
	}

	text = {

		trigger = {

			OR = {

		trigger = {
			is_female = no
			government_rank = 1 
			NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
			OR = {
				has_reform = secular_order_reform
				has_reform = monastic_order_reform

			}

			is_elector = yes
			is_emperor = no
		}
